text: The Miami cannibal attack happened on May 26, 2012. Rudy Eugene assaulted Ronald Poppo, a homeless man on the MacArthur Causeway in Miami, Florida, United States. Eugene bit off most of Poppo's face above his beard. The attack ended when Eugene was shot dead by a police officer. It is not known why the attack happened. ==References== Category:2012 crimes in the United States Category:2012 in Florida Cannibal attack Category:Cannibalism Category:Crime in Florida Category:May 2012 events
title: Miami cannibal attack
